original: mañjīrair vilasatpiśaṅgavalayaṃ lakṣmyāṅkitaṃ śāśvatam sarveśaṃ karuṇākaraṃ suravarair bhaktaiḥ samāsevitam // SatvT_9.21

saṃlikhati apramattaḥ sau gaṇeśaḥ mad sutaḥ ntike

original: yajanty avirataṃ devān paśūn hatvā sukhecchayā // SatvT_9.49
analyzed: yajanti aviratam devān paśūn hatvā sukha icchayā

analyzed: iti etat kathitam vipra tantram sātvatam uttamam
